page.title: 13LIFE STYLE - HOME LIFE
page.content:
45% of our surveyed homes are{heated} by solid fuel (coke or coal), 27% by wood, 18% by oil and 9% by electricity. No gas heating was recorded.
{Cooking,}however, was divided: 90% by electricity, 27% by solid fuel and 9% by oil (some houses possess dual fuel cooking facilities). No gas, again, was recorded. All homes possessed a refrigerator, 72% a freezer and 90% of families used food mixers/processors.
All homes are{cleaned}with vacuum cleaners, and all run washing machines. 55% of homes are fitted with showers.
